translations: v.卸载；卸货；摆脱（无用之物）（非正式）；倾诉，吐露（思想）（unload 的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: He was only responsible for unloading food.
When you're ready to start unloading some of your stuff, that list will be a good place to start.
sentences.translation: 当你准备开始卸载一些东西时，可以从这个不错的清单开始。

sentences.sentence: Concrete mixing and unloading mainly depend on the two spiral mixing leaves, so the design of the helical mixing blades is particularly important.
sentences.translation: 混凝土的搅拌和卸载主要依靠两个螺旋搅拌叶片，因此螺旋搅拌叶片的设计尤为重要。
